    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static GasVehicle
    GasolineVehicleDB.search​(Long id)
    Searches a vehicle in the database by serial number using the SQL command Select.
    Methods in database that return types with arguments of type GasVehicle
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static ArrayList<GasVehicle>
    GasolineVehicleDB.select()
    Displays all vehicles in the database using the SQL command Select.
    static ArrayList<GasVehicle>
    GasolineVehicleDB.sort()
    Displays and sorts the list of vehicles in the database by mileage efficiency using the SQL command Select and Order By.

    Modifies a GasVehicle in the database of GasolineVehicleDB by using the SQL command Update.
